name: Roid Rage (itch) (BettyRed)
description:
An Asteroids clone I made in GameMaker  from a tutorial on Youtube.  I added  new interactions, original graphics, effects, and a few enemies and ad-ons of my own.  I would like to expand it into a space roguelike.

Here is the tutorial I used if anyone is interested.  It's one of the best I've come across for absolute beginners.  My favorite part is that she finishes the tutorial, and THEN she updates it!  Who would have thought it was possible! I dove into my fair share of terrible tutorials that never got finished (that's where BumpFire Betty came from!) so I extra-appreciate these.
